name: Dungeon Man and the Shifting Sword
name_original: Dungeon Man and the Shifting Sword
description:
Here is our Ludum Dare 35 entry!

This game was made with Construct 2 by Fistmaker.

Music was created by Kiersten Redmyer.

Controls:

WASD: Movement

Shift: Run

Mouse: Attack / Special

or you can use an Xbox controller!

Thanks for taking the time to check out our entry!
